review: Dayz in a nutshell: 'oh a gun! now i can get my friends at cherno and i have a reason to survive! i could be a HERO!'Infestation in a nutshell: 'AHH OH MY GOD WHY IS THERE A FLOATING HAMMER HITTING ME?! WHERE DID THIS ZOMBIE COME FROM?! oh look, i can buy hats! their pricey but i'm sure i'll be able to keep them after i die.' *dies* 'MOTHER..... F**KING.... ZOMBIIIIEES!!!!'this game is worthless, do not make the same mistake i did by buying it.negative eight out of ten.
